actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the exemption for Congress or for the United States from the application of certain provisions of Federal law relating to social security, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program for the Vice President, Members of Congress, and Congressional employees.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the exemption for Congress or for the United States from the application of certain provisions of Federal law relating to social security, and for other purposes.
